roleset.name: in agreeable combination

role.descr: other compatible thing, compatible with what?

example.name: All args
example.text: Using " compatible with , " " fits , " or " for " before a brand name in the title of your listing to describe items that are universally compatible or that-1 *T*-1 are compatible with an entire product class.
